ygData.subject: RE: Guise of the Deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: Now I m confused.  Why didn t your song graphics show up?  You mentioned it but left out the explanation.  Do you get no song graphics if you are wearing a
ygData.messageBody:
Now I'm confused. Why didn't your song graphics show up? You mentioned it but
left out the explanation. Do you get no song graphics if you are wearing a
Guise? Did the ranger quit because he thought you weren't singing any songs?

Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal [SMTP:birdman@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 1:49 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Guise of the Deceiver
>
> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
> On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, Katy Westerman wrote:
>
> > Just saw that this had been changed in the patch. Anyone have any
> > info?
>
> I happened to join the first supply room group after the server came back
> up postpatch Wednesday afternoon. The leader of the group, a 46 woodelf
> ranger, impressed me with his organizational skills. He had us (well, the
> others who were more or less soloers acting together) working together
> with some decent tactics going on.
>
> Of course, once the guise showed up, he got extremely pissed and left
> midfight. I was rather confused as to why my song graphics weren't
> showing up till I realized what had happened.
>
> Then a barbarian warrior shows up, doesn't tell us he's new to the area,
> and falls off the walkway. I sat up there watching him die, eventually
> someone went down and had a spell cast on them (by one of the NPCs). I
> tell the wizard Get ready to evac, and about 30 seconds after the
> warrior's death, the room is mobbed by about 5 frogloks (more on the way,
> I'm sure), along with a handful of greater darkbone skeletons.
>
> Athren Notechaser, sackless on CT
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with
> the subject submissions.
